name: Crome
description: Crome blockchain is a network that provides solutions and services in decentralized application codebase development, resolving blockchain network problems and issues with cutting edge direct ledger technology. Crome usecase provides a platform for permissioned and non-permissioned networks for public and private enterprise for a more efficient operation. Crome applications gives users a feature-rich blockchain platform fortified with reliable institutional-grade security and performance.
